name: Web Development
description: In this course, we will learn the basic tools that every web page coder needs to know. We will start from the ground up by learning how to implement modern web pages with HTML and CSS.

name: Data Science
description: Data science is one of the hottest professions of the decade, and the demand for data scientists who can analyze data and communicate results to inform data driven decisions has never been greater. In this course, we will learn the basics of data science and how to use data science tools to analyze data and communicate results to inform data driven decisions.

name: Machine Learning
description: Machine learning is the study of algorithms that can be used to automatically learn from data. In this course, we will learn the basics of machine learning and how to use machine learning tools to analyze data and communicate results to inform data driven decisions.

name: Python
description: Python is a powerful programming language that is used to build web applications and software. In this course, we will learn the basics of Python and how to use Python tools to analyze data and communicate results to inform data driven decisions.

name: Java
description: Java is a powerful programming language that is used to build web applications and software. In this course, we will learn the basics of Java and how to use Java tools to analyze data and communicate results to inform data driven decisions.
